state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First of all, try to venture north. And then, make an attempt to go west. After that, go to the north. Then, take a trip east. Next, try to venture east. Okay, and then, make an attempt to venture north. Following that, go west. Okay, and then, move north. That done, make an effort to go east. Then, make an attempt to go to the south. And then, go east. And then, take a trip east. With that over with, head south. And then, go to the east.
